name: Pizzemory
description:
Pizzemory Once time ago a small chef said: 
Someday i will cook legendary pizza..

Fulfill his desire and create your super pizza

Instructions:

Look at the pizza on the screen and try to cook it on the left side, using the ingredients on the right side~

Controls:

  • Space:  Send for tasting;
  • Left mouse button : Grab indgidient and drag it on the pizza;
  • Right mouse button when dragging : Grab more ingridients together;
  • Mouse wheel: Rotate ingridients;

Especially for «PIZZA JAM»
